title: SAP FICO Solution Architect / Manager
description: This is a delivery-focused role in an implementation project, managing complex delivery. Candidate must have implementation experience and be able to support Global Business Solution implementations by effective management of global end to end business processes including process re-engineering and process flow analysis.Pre-Requisites:  Must have strong FICO working experience with all business partners and manage relationships  Able to configure and end to end activities of integrated global business solution implementations  Has management of assigned business solution projects including integrating plans with plans of other business partners under consulting backgroundResponsibilities:  You will be part of full project lifecycle experience including design, data, functional specs, configuration, testing and post go live support experience  Assess and recommend solutions according to scope and to resolve open design issues  Identifies, assesses and solves complex business problems for area of responsibility, where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors  Configuration of SAP FICO to support scope; document configuration rationale  Develop Functional Specs for all relevant developments to support all SAP processes  Develop / Update relevant Master Data Standards especially master data to support SAP FICO processes  Maintain clear and organized documentation of all work and assist with the user training and support where necessary.  Plan, Manage and Lead the testing efforts and drive business partners to complete testing and approve solution  Address, respond and resolve all service requests in most efficient and timely manner.  Engage with business users and stakeholders to gauge business requirements and provide inputs from IT perspective.  Regularly update business partners with progress of the work if issues cannot be resolved in expected time.  Monitor and maintain system activities with focus on interfaces, batch jobs, short dumps, connectivity to internal and external systems.  Guide and respond to business users of system use, business processes, testing and other system related inquiries.  Plan milestone and deadline and provide progress update to various stakeholders and escalate in advance if timelines cannot be met with.  Execution of allotted responsibilities in special projects and adhere to various deadlines of the projects.  You will also be involved in project implementation methodologies  ITIL processes.Requirements:  Must have more than 10 working years in SAP environment; must have more than 3-4 years in consulting industry.  Involved in at least 3-4 end to end cycle of SAP FICO in system configuration and implementation projects in consulting environment  Strong experience in development of custom reports and enhancements.  Strong organizational/planning skills with the ability to prioritize and work effectively in a fast-paced environment, proficiency in multi-tasking  Have supporting testing and data migration experience, as well as drafting of functional specification for reports, interface, enhancement, forms  Able to start in a short notice periodPersonal Attributes:  You must possess a personal attribute such as creativity, positive thinking, quick-witted, imagination, leadership, judgment and maturity, curiosity, strong interpersonal skills, professional integrity and initiative.  It would be great if you have excellent analytical, presentation and soft skills including communication; write clearly and concisely in prepare training materials  Confident in communicating and presenting at business level to MNC clients.

title: Senior Systems Architect
description: Meet Our Team: As a key member of the Pega APAC System Architecture team, you will work with a passionate and driven project team, delivering new and innovative business and technical solutions using Pega technology. Picture Yourself at Pega: Pega is changing the way the world builds software. In this role, you‚Äôll help us design, develop, implement and test the next generation of Pega‚Äôs products. This is your chance to get your hands-on leading technology that figures out what people really care about. What You'll Do at Pega:   Partner with our world leading clients to deliver high quality technical solutions across all phases of the software development lifecycle   Utilise your outstanding technical consulting skills to demonstrate new and innovative ways to implement software solutions   Mentor and train our clients in Pega technology   Leveraging your Thought Leadership skills, you‚Äôll engage, educate and enable your clients‚Äô resources on Industry and Pega Best Practices.   Collaborating with a high performing Pega delivery team you will ensure the solution meets or exceeds your client‚Äôs expectations.  Who You Are:   You are a highly technical hands on Snr Developer/Engineer/Systems Architect who is passionate about exploring and applying Pega technology to help solve business problems   5‚Äì10 years of software development experience   Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or similar field   Agile/Scrum development methodology knowledge/experience  Exposure to a variety of technologies, including, but not limited to, WebSphere or Weblogic, J2EE (JSP, Servlets, EJB, XML, Java), .Net, Oracle, DB2, and MS/SQL.   Demonstrated knowledge of and applicability of Object-Oriented techniques and principles What You've Accomplished:   You‚Äôve built and implemented model-driven, enterprise-level business solutions and applications   You have been exposed to a variety of technologies including object-oriented design principles, database design, application and web servers   Strong track record of customer engagement and delivery success   3-5+ years of experience working with industry leading technologies to deliver your solution designs and vision in a fast-paced environment   Considered a trusted advisor and thought leader by your clients Pega Offers You:   Gartner Analyst acclaimed technology leadership across our categories of products   Continuous learning and development opportunities   An innovative, inclusive, agile, flexible, and fun work environment  Competitive global benefits program inclusive of pay + bonus incentive, Paid family medical, employee equity in the company

title: Lifting Supervisor
description: DescriptionSupervises lifting team in lifting works such as equipment lifting and erection works.Responsibilities  To carry out checks and ensure validity of lifting gears/apparatuses prior operating any lifting devices.  To conduct preliminary checks to ensure ground conditions are visually good to operate lifting activities.  To apply lifting permit prior to any lifting works.  To be able to read loading charts/ drawings and advise the lifting crews to execute lifting work in a proper and safe manner.  To ensure sound communication with rigger/signal team and lorry crane operator to safely carry out lifting works.  To carry out other tasks as instructed by Superior.Requirements  Diploma  Minimum 3 years of experience in the same field of work.  Certified for Lifting Supervisor Safety Course.  LMS Certification is preferred.

title: Senior Human Resource Business Partner, Tech
description: ABOUT THIS ROLE  We have an opening for a People and Culture Senior Business Partner who wants to gain valuable experience and exposure in a hyper-growth environment in Singapore.  Reporting to Head of People Partnering, the successful candidate will be supporting our managers through a mixture of strategy development and execution of people programs and initiatives, creating a high-performance environment for Circles.Life during our hyper growth, and ensuring alignment of our      organisational strategy with our people strategy and using data to develop best practices derived from first principles  S/he will be expected to coach and advise managers on how to build high performing and engaged teams including talent review, team development/career planning, succession planning, recognition, employee relations concerns, performance management, leaves of absence, local labor laws, global mobility, compensation and benefits.  This is a group-level role based in SingaporeABOUT CIRCLES LIFE  Circles.Life is Asia‚Äôs first and most successful digital telco and we are on a mission to re-imagine the mobile experience for the digital consumer and disrupt the multi-trillion dollar industry. We launched our services in Singapore in 2016, and have since expanded to Australia, Taiwan, Indonesia and Japan. We are leading the market in innovation, customer satisfaction and growth.  Circles.Life was founded by Rameez Ansar (ex-Temasek, BCG), Abhishek Gupta (ex-McKinsey, Bain Capital, StanChart PE)  Adeel Najam (ex- Nokia, Huawei, Starhub), who are supported by an all-star leadership team      including C-suite executives from Tata Docomo, Paypal, Vodafone, Bharti Airtel, Hooq/ Singtel, and Flipkart (to name a few)  It now employs 400+ people over 5 APAC offices. It is the portfolio company of Warburg Pincus and Sequoia Notable accolades from past years include: Top 5 most loved Singapore brands (2nd year running) - YouGov Customer's Choice; Top Telco for Customer Service- Seedly; and Top Employer- Influential Brands (2019)WHY THIS ROLE IS UNIQUE  Unparalleled access - Not only will the successful candidate have broad content knowledge across departments, but they also understand how the Founder and leadership team think and know what‚Äôs top of mind. They should use this to connect dots across projects, people, and departments to improve decision-making and make the organization work better.  Working with passionate, smart and driven colleagues in a vibrant environment.  Create your own path - autonomy and freedom to define the vision and be the one responsible to make it happen  10X - Be part of a fast-growing organisation with ambitious plans to expand into multiple more markets and verticals, and help be the one to make it happenWHAT YOU‚ÄôLL DO  Partner with People Programs, People Operations, Graduate Career, Performance Management and Total Rewards.  Partner with Tech leaders and develop Learning  Development strategy  Recruiting, Inclusion and Diversity and Education to develop programs that continually elevate the caliber of Circles.Life.  Analyse people data and trends to inform decisions on strategy and programs.  Be the catalyst for process improvements in ongoing operations and programs to scale smoothly through our next phase of growth.WHO YOU‚ÄôLL BE WORKING WITH  Chief People Officer  Head of People Partnering  Other Functional Heads within People  Culture  Additional key internal and external stakeholdersWHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR  Minimum 15 years of working experience, at least 3 of which in HR, with recent experience in a business partnering capacity  Someone passionate about Technology, Disruptive models, Organisational Culture, and Talent Management.  A business partner who deeply understands Circles.Life‚Äôs strategy and aligns it with the engineering organization‚Äôs structures, processes, initiatives and processes.  A strategist and scaler, who can connect the dots between where we‚Äôre going and how we need to nudge the organization to get there.BENEFITS  One of Circles.Life's key missions is to build the best place to work and grow. In order to do that, we offer:  Exponential career growth  ownership - Completely own your own career and determine how fast and in which direction you grow. Being in a hyper-growth environment means having the opportunity for 10x the learning at 10x the speed; watch your role expand as the company expands.  Impact from Day 1 - Translate idea to action and help us to blaze the trial for innovative products and shake up the telco world, and beyond.  Talent Mobility - Circles.Lifers are given the opportunity to change roles internally, across functions and/or offices, through multiple structured programs (i.e. internal transfers, job shadowing or job rotation). We've      witnessed many successful examples -e.g., from HR lead to Business Development Senior Manager.  Talent Development - We stand for a culture of continuous learning and growing.  Besides structured career development paths and quarterly performance reviews, we offer monthly learning brown bag sessions, manager training and LD budget to support development of professional interests and efforts.  Attractive Total Rewards (Salary + Equity) - We offer highly competitive salary and bonus inline with top tier technology companies, and equity for ALL employees (up to 6 months of annual salary worth for top performers). That means, unlimited upside based on company's performance.  Benefits - Mobile bill reimbursement for all Circles.Lifers and their dependents and medical insurance.   Bonus: Well-stocked pantry and monthly fun activities.

May need to work over time.  Job Responsibilities  APO will require a candidate who is meticulous, good with numbers and a team-player to fulfil the roles and responsibilities indicated below:  IEnhance (e.g. automate) systems and processes to improve financial accountability by setting clearer guidelines and enabling programme owners in team to track payments and budget utilisation more easily;  Coordinate responses across the Active Ageing teams (e.g. sending and consolidating emails, data entry, merging spreadsheets) for finance-related matters e.g. budget submissions, progress updates, internal/ external audits;  Liaise with external stakeholders (e.g. healthcare clusters, the People‚Äôs Association, Agency for Integrated Care) on incoming/outgoing finance-related queries, assessment of budget proposals, disbursements, budget projections and submission of progress reports;  Manage the teams‚Äô finance folders and records;  Support the teams on various administrative matters e.g. coordinating input across the team in response to ad-hoc requests, vetting funding agreements, submission of disbursement requests and processing of claims  APO may also involve the temp staff in other on-going tasks within the Division, such as ad-hoc projects, as and when required.Job Requirements  Writing and organisation skills  Proficiency with Excel and data entry  Data Analysis, Report Writing, Admin and Management
